Ten years after the Black Death ravaged their country, a poor family travels in search of better living conditions. On a deserted mountain pass, they are attacked by a gang of ruthless outlaws who only saves Signe, a girl of 19 years. She is taken prisoner and taken to their camp. Soon, she realizes that she is destined to something worse than death. So Signe understands that the only solution is to escape.
